analysis.description:
MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#384-411) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- erc20Balance == 0

ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#142-152) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_tokenAddress).transfer(_destination,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#146-152)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- erc20Balance = ERC20(_tokenContractAddress).balanceOf(deposit) (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#390-391)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- ChildDeposit(deposit).withdraw(_tokenContractAddress,coldWallet1Share,coldWallet1) (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#402-406)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- ChildDeposit(deposit).withdraw(_tokenContractAddress,coldWallet2Share,coldWallet2) (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#407-411)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#143-145) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#145-146) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_destination' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#146) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MasterDeposit.fireDepositToChildEvent (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#363) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet1' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#320) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet2' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#320) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_percentage' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#320-321) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_count' of MasterDeposit.createChildDeposits (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#332) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_depositCreator' of MasterDeposit.setDepositCreator (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#342) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_percentage' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet1SplitPercentage (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#351) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_coldWallet1' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet1 (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#371) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_coldWallet2' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet2 (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#373) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_deposits' of MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#385-386) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenContractAddress' of MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x3845f2534e6db61d3c093a84fa6b3672c895c91b.sol#387) is not in mixedCase
